name: ROBO WRECKER
description:
The robot apocalypse started while you were on your demolition job! Use your electromagnetically controlled wrecking ball to hold off the robots for as long as you can.

As you kill more and more robots, they'll start appearing faster - you'll hear a tone every time the speed goes up. Can you smash them faster than they can teleport in?

This game was made in under 48 hours, in Godot, for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam. The theme was "Joined Together".

Playing the downloadable version is recommended for better performance.

Controls Keyboard

WASD or Arrow Keys to move
Hold Space to release ball
R to restart
M to mute music
N to mute sound effects

Controller

Left stick or D-Pad to move
Hold A to release ball
Y to restart
Start/Menu to mute music
Back/View to mute sound effects

PS4/Nintendo Pro Controllers should work, but I haven't tested them, and the web version's support for those controllers will depend on your browser.

Credits

The music is Underworld, from the album Soul Waste by Patricia Taxxon, licenced  under CC BY-SA 3.0

Sounds used from freesound.org:
Freesound - "Foley_Impact_Smash_Tiles_Stereo.wav" by Nox_Sound
Freesound - "Metal Sheet Hit" by dmitryleeo
Freesound - "Crash.wav" by FxKid2

Other sounds generated using sfxr

Sound design/editing done in Ableton Live 11 Intro
